item.title: Website is live!
item.description: After several online tutorials, followed by weeks of on-again, off-again debugging, my personal website is up and running! I will use this site as a longer-standing version of my LinkedIn profile, documenting relevant updates and content as I make my way through graduate school. Thanks for stopping by! Due credit to the talented @colorfullyso for creating my avatar/logo.
